GenomicSuperSignaturePaper 1.0.0
  • RAVmodel
    • Training Data
    • Number of clusters
    • Pathway separation
  • EDA
    • Database search
    • Annoated PCA
  • Subtyping
    • RAVs similar to PCSS1/2
    • Metadata based search
    • CRC subtype scores
    • CRC clinical variables
  • Transfer Learning
    • Neutrophil (SLE-WB)
    • Neutrophil (NARES)

Fig 3. Sample scores for disease subtyping and metadata characterization

Source: vignettes/CRC/manuscript_Figures.Rmd
manuscript_Figures.Rmd

Figure 3

a <- readRDS("outputs/scatter_834_833.rds")
b <- readRDS("outputs/boxplot_CMS_vs_834_833.rds")
c <- readRDS("outputs/boxplot_PCSS_vs_834_833.rds")
abc <- ggarrange(ggarrange(a$value, labels = "A"),
                 ggarrange(b$value, c$value,
                           labels = c("B", "C"),
                           nrow = 2, align = "hv",
                           heights = c(1, 1)),
                 ncol = 2,
                 widths = c(1.4, 1),
                 font.label = list(size = 15),
                 align = "hv")
## Warning: Removed 86 rows containing non-finite values (stat_boxplot).
## Warning: Removed 86 rows containing missing values (geom_point).
## Warning: Removed 82 rows containing non-finite values (stat_boxplot).
## Warning: Removed 82 rows containing missing values (geom_point).
abc


## Save Supplementary Figure 3
png("manuscript_Fig3.png", width = 1000, height = 550)
abc
dev.off()
## agg_png 
##       2

## Clean-up
rm(a,b,c,abc)

Supplementary Figure 5

a <- readRDS("outputs/scatter_1575_834.rds")
b <- readRDS("outputs/boxplot_CMS_vs_1575_834.rds")
c <- readRDS("outputs/boxplot_PCSS_vs_1575_834.rds")
d <- readRDS("outputs/scatter_832_188.rds")
e <- readRDS("outputs/boxplot_CMS_vs_832_188.rds")
f <- readRDS("outputs/boxplot_PCSS_vs_832_188.rds")
all <- ggarrange(ggarrange(a$value, d$value,
                           labels = c("A", "D"), 
                           nrow = 2),
                 ggarrange(b$value, c$value, e$value, f$value,
                           labels = c("B", "C", "E", "F"),
                           nrow = 4),
                 ncol = 2,
                 widths = c(1.4, 1),
                 font.label = list(size = 15),
                 align = "hv")
## Warning: Removed 86 rows containing non-finite values (stat_boxplot).
## Warning: Removed 86 rows containing missing values (geom_point).
## Warning: Removed 86 rows containing non-finite values (stat_boxplot).
## Warning: Removed 86 rows containing missing values (geom_point).
## Warning: Removed 86 rows containing non-finite values (stat_boxplot).
## Warning: Removed 86 rows containing missing values (geom_point).
## Warning: Removed 84 rows containing non-finite values (stat_boxplot).
## Warning: Removed 84 rows containing missing values (geom_point).
all


## Save Supplementary Figure 3
png("manuscript_Sup_Fig5.png", width = 1000, height = 1100)
all
dev.off()
## agg_png 
##       2

## Clean-up
rm(a,b,c,d,e,f,all)

Supplementary Figure 6

a <- readRDS("outputs/10_CRC_datasets/scatter_PCSS.rds")
b <- readRDS("outputs/10_CRC_datasets/scatter_834_833.rds")
c <- readRDS("outputs/10_CRC_datasets/boxplot_CMS_vs_PCSS.rds")
d <- readRDS("outputs/10_CRC_datasets/boxplot_CMS_vs_834_833.rds")
e <- readRDS("outputs/10_CRC_datasets/boxplot_PCSS_vs_834_833.rds")
all <- ggarrange(ggarrange(a, b$value,
                           labels = c("A", "B"), 
                           nrow = 2),
                 ggarrange(c$value, d$value, e$value,
                           labels = c("C", "D", "E"),
                           nrow = 3),
                 ncol = 2,
                 widths = c(1.4, 1),
                 font.label = list(size = 15),
                 align = "hv")
## Warning: Removed 46 rows containing non-finite values (stat_boxplot).
## Warning: Removed 46 rows containing missing values (geom_point).
## Warning: Removed 46 rows containing non-finite values (stat_boxplot).
## Warning: Removed 46 rows containing missing values (geom_point).
## Warning: Removed 44 rows containing non-finite values (stat_boxplot).
## Warning: Removed 44 rows containing missing values (geom_point).
all


## Save Supplementary Figure 3
png("manuscript_Sup_Fig6.png", width = 700, height = 770)
all
dev.off()
## agg_png 
##       2

## Clean-up
rm(a,b,c,d,e,all)
